mosinstall.name: BSQ Sitestats Visitor Graph
mosinstall.author: Brent Stolle
mosinstall.license: This module is released under the GNU/GPL License
mosinstall.description: This module shows a graph of visitors to your site at several different configurable time intervals

param.name: timeinterval
param.label: Tick Interval
param.description: What time interval should the x-axis ticks be at?

param.name: cachetime
param.label: Cache Timeout
param.description: How often should we regenerate the image (in seconds). A good number is half of the Tick Interval.

param.name: imagewidth
param.label: Width
param.description: Width of the image to be generated (in pixels)

param.name: imageheight
param.label: Height
param.description: Height of the image to be generated (in pixels)
